title: Justice for All with Cristina Perez
overview: Distinguished author and three-time Emmy® winner Judge Cristina Perez puts the flair in fair in this courtroom series. Her hip and fresh perspective, combined with her warm and personal approach, appeals to all ages — as well as Television Academy voters. Justice for All with Judge Cristina Perez was nominated for a best court program Emmy® Award and backboarded the launch of two accredited novels and a growing fanbase.
